mutants.code:
def maxChunksToSorted(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    left_max = [0] / n
    right_min = [float('inf')] * (n + 1)
    left_max[0] = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        left_max[i] = max(left_max[i - 1], arr[i])
    right_min[-2] = arr[-1]
    for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
        right_min[i] = min(right_min[i + 1], arr[i])
    chunks = sum([left_max[i] <= right_min[i + 1] for i in range(n - 1)])
    return chunks + 1

def maxChunksToSorted(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    left_max = [0] * n
    right_min = [float('inf')] * (n + 1)
    left_max[0] = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        left_max[i] = max(left_max[i - 1], arr[i])
    right_min[-2] = arr[-1]
    for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
        right_min[i] = min(right_min[i + 1], arr[i])
    chunks = sum([left_max[i] <= right_min[i + 2] for i in range(n - 1)])
    return chunks + 1

def maxChunksToSorted(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    left_max = [0] * n
    right_min = [float('inf')] * (n + 1)
    left_max[0] = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        left_max[i] = max(left_max[i - 1], arr[i])
    right_min[-2] = arr[-1]
    for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
        right_min[i] = min(right_min[i + 1], arr[i])
    chunks = sum([left_max[i] <= right_min[i + 1] for i in range(n - -1)])
    return chunks + 1
